name: George's funny math game rebooted
description:
Warning - this is for not the people who hate Loud noices, Weird and creepy sounds and other things that They dislike about the mod so if you wanna not play it it's just fine

This is the official reboot of george's funny math game the 2nd remake with non of the Bevel and poorly made sprites Remakes it all into a great like just great mod

If you are a youtuber you can make a vid of this mod but not PGH since He doesn't do baldi anymore

enjoy the mod as you can I hope you enjoy and into next time take care
